metadata.name: ISO File Created Within Temp Folders
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a ISO file in the Outlook temp folder or in the Appdata temp folder. Typical of Qakbot TTP from end-July 2022.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('.zip\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.iso')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\microsoft\\windows\\inetcache\\content.outlook\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.iso'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a ISO file in the Outlook temp folder or in the Appdata temp folder. Typical of Qakbot TTP from end-July 2022.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: actor.process.name, ComputerName, TargetFileName False positive: Potential FP by sysadmin opening a zip file containing a legitimate ISO file References: https://twitter.com/Sam0x90/status/1552011547974696960, https://securityaffairs.co/wordpress/133680/malware/dll-sideloading-spread-qakbot.html, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/0f229c0e42bfe7ca736a14023836d65baa941ed2/atomics/T1553.005/T1553.005.md#atomic-test-1---mount-iso-image
